model_answer: A: A computer screen showing a webpage about the May 16, 2022 Total Lunar Eclipse, with sections like “Eclipse Information,” “Eclipse Map,” “3D Globe Map,” “Live Streams,” a countdown, a visibility map, and a detailed timeline.

The visual that appears concurrently is option D: A black screen with the stylized “S” and “SQUARESPACE” text. This is because the audio clip describes the video being sponsored by Squarespace, but does not mention any visual elements such as a camera setup or a portfolio website.
